plurals.name: diff_years
plurals.item: Text indicating that the event occurred two or more years ago.\"%d\" is the number of years.
Text indicating that the event occurred one year ago.

plurals.name: notification_archive_message
plurals.item: Message shown when multiple notifications are archived. The %d is replaced with the number of notifications.
Message shown when a single notification is archived.

plurals.name: notification_channel_name
plurals.item: Name of the notification channel that shows the app is downloading two or more articles
Name of the notification channel that shows the app is downloading one article

plurals.name: notification_syncing_description
plurals.item: Text of notification shows the remaining articles. The \"%1$d\" symbol corresponds to the amount of remaining articles.
Text of notification shows the remaining article. The \"%1$d\" symbol corresponds to the amount of remaining articles.

plurals.name: notification_syncing_reading_list_channel_name
plurals.item: Name of the notification channel of syncing two or more reading lists
Name of the notification channel of syncing one reading list

plurals.name: notification_syncing_reading_list_description
plurals.item: Text of notification shows the remaining lists. The \"%1$d\" symbol corresponds to the amount of remaining lists.
Text of notification shows the remaining list. The \"%1$d\" symbol corresponds to the amount of remaining lists.

plurals.name: notification_syncing_reading_list_title
plurals.item: Title for notification when the syncing two or more reading lists process begins. The \"%1$d\" symbol corresponds to the amount of lists.
Title for notification when the syncing one reading list process begins. The \"%1$d\" symbol corresponds to the amount of lists.

plurals.name: notification_syncing_title
plurals.item: Title for notification when the downloading process of two or more article begins. The \"%1$d\" symbol corresponds to the amount of articles.
Title for notification when the downloading process of one article begins. The \"%1$d\" symbol corresponds to the amount of articles.

plurals.name: reading_list_article_not_offline_message
plurals.item: Message shown when more than one reading list article is removed from offline availability.
Message shown when a single reading list article is removed from offline availability.

plurals.name: reading_list_article_offline_message
plurals.item: Message shown when more than one reading list article is made available for offline use.
Message shown when a single reading list article is made available for offline use.

plurals.name: suggested_edits_contribution_count
plurals.item: Text suggesting that two or more in-app contributions were made. %d is the number of contribution.
Text suggesting that one in-app contribution was made.

plurals.name: view_continue_reading_card_subtitle
plurals.item: Subtitle for a \"continue reading\" card two or more days old. The first word should have an initial uppercase letter if appropriate for the language. Example: [[phab:F4695814]]. Use the %d parameter to insert the number of days passed since the content (an article) was last seen.
Subtitle for a day old \"continue reading\" card. The word should be in lowercase if appropriate for the language.

plurals.name: wikipedia_languages_remove_dialog_title
plurals.item: Title of the dialog that pop-ups after clicking on the delete icon in the action mode when two or more items have been selected.
Title of the dialog that pop-ups after clicking on the delete icon in the action mode when only one item has been selected.
